committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for the addition of lands to the Gallatin National Forest in order to protect wildlife and geothermal features of Yellowstone National Park.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire certain lands in Montana for addition to the Gallatin National Forest in order to protect wildlife and geothermal resources of Yellowstone National Park.

titles.title: To provide for the addition of lands to the Gallatin National Forest in order to protect wildlife and geothermal features of Yellowstone National Park.
